Package com.nus.cool.core.io.compression

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Compressor
    Interface for compression opertors applying to various data structure used in COOL.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitVectorCompressor
    Compress a list of integers with BitVector encoding.
    CompressorAdviser
    Advise codec according to compress type.
    CompressorFactory
    Product compressor according to codes.
    DeltaCompressor
    Compress integers using delta encoding, get max delta by max value and min value in integers and choose ZIntCompressor by max delta and compress delta value vector by ZIntCompressor.
    Histogram
    Properties for compress.
    LZ4JavaCompressor
    LZ4Compressor for compressing string values.
    OutputCompressor
    Utility class for writing a compressed integer/string vector into disk.
    RLECompressor
    Compress data sequences in which same data value occurs in many consecutive data elements are stored as single data value and count.
    SimpleBitSetCompressor
    Compress BitSet using rle schema, prefer sorted BitSet.
    ZIntBitCompressor
    ZIntBitCompressor.
    ZIntCompressor
    Compress integers using the leading zero suppressed schema.
